title: Amazing Stories Volume 04 Number 05

description: Amazing Stories, volume 4, number 5 (August 1929). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publishing Co., Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Barton's Island (Harl Vincent), The Eternal Professors (David H. Keller), The Dimension Segregator (J. Harold Click), The Wand of Creation (Stanton A. Coblentz), Out of the Void (Leslie F. Stone; 1/2), The Grim Inheritance (Carl Clausen), and Sam Graves' Gravity Nullifier (George Fredric Stratton).
